text: The Ronald Reagan Park () is located in the neighborhood of Przymorze Wielkie, Gdańsk, Poland. It was built between 2003 and 2006 out of formerly barren lands. It covers 40 hectares. It honors US President Ronald Reagan, who was considered for playing a major role in the fall of Communism in Poland. It also honors Pope John Paul II. ==References== Category:Parks in Europe Category:Things named after Ronald Reagan Category:Buildings and structures in Gdańsk
title: Ronald Reagan Park, Gdańsk
